definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="UnderSoil">UnderSoil</variable><variable type="MCItem" id="Air">Air</variable><variable type="MCItem" id="TopSoil">TopSoil</variable><variable type="String" id="AirTagName">AirTagName</variable><variable type="String" id="TopSoilTagName">TopSoilTagName</variable><variable type="String" id="UnderSoilTagName">UnderSoilTagName</variable><variable type="Boolean" id="EnableSoilReplacement">EnableSoilReplacement</variable><variable type="Boolean" id="DontSpawnStructure">DontSpawnStructure</variable><variable type="Boolean" id="EnableTagSupport">EnableTagSupport</variable><variable type="Number" id="PositionX2">PositionX2</variable><variable type="Number" id="PositionZ">PositionZ</variable><variable type="Number" id="PositionOffsetZ">PositionOffsetZ</variable><variable type="Number" id="PositionOffsetX">PositionOffsetX</variable><variable type="Number" id="StructureSizeZ">StructureSizeZ</variable><variable type="Number" id="StructureSizeX">StructureSizeX</variable><variable type="Number" id="PositionX">PositionX</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">local:EnableSoilReplacement</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If enabled this will replace the soil under the structure with the under soil block (Dirt)</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">local:EnableTagSupport</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If enabled, the script will use mostly tag support. Make sure to still fill out the red blocks below.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_text"><field name="VAR">local:TopSoilTagName</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This sets the tag name for your Top Soil blocks if TAG support is enabled.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">namespace:structure_grass_blocks</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_text"><field name="VAR">local:UnderSoilTagName</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This sets the tag name for your Under Soil blocks if TAG support is enabled.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">namespace:structure_dirt_blocks</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_text"><field name="VAR">local:AirTagName</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This sets the tag name for your Air blocks if TAG support is enabled.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">namespace:structure_air_blocks</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:TopSoil</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This sets your top soil block for your biome or world. (Grass Block)</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Desertgrass</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:UnderSoil</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This sets your under soil block for your biome or world. (Dirt Block)</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.SMOOTH_SANDSTONE</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><field name="VAR">local:Air</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This sets your air block for your biome or world. (Air Block)</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:PositionOffsetX</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This will offset the structure testing area towards the center of the structure for Position X.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:PositionOffsetZ</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This will offset the structure testing area towards the center of the structure for Position Z.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:StructureSizeX</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Sets the structure X direction size.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:StructureSizeZ</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Sets the structure Z direction size.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:PositionX</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">DO NOT EDIT</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:PositionZ</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">DO NOT EDIT</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:PositionX2</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">DO NOT EDIT</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="variables_get_number"><field
